name: asexual
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
without sex or sexual organs: Algae reproduce by both sexual and asexual reproduction. At this stage in their development the ferns are asexual, producing no flowers. Compare
parthenogenetic specialized
not experiencing sexual attraction (= the feeling of liking someone sexually), or relating to people who do not experience sexual attraction: The book's diverse cast of characters included an asexual protagonist. An asexual individual may choose to engage in sexual activity even while not experiencing sexual attraction. Synonym
ace (SEXUALITY) informalCompare
aromantic adjective
not clearly male or female: She cultivated an austere, asexual look: short hair, trousers, all black clothes. Synonym
androgynousCompare
epicene formal
More examplesFewer examplesI found that the website was a good way of meeting other members of the asexual community. They had a close but asexual relationship.Scientists warned that the rare cases of asexual births in sharks cannot be seen as a solution to declining global populations.
Related words
asexuality
asexually
a person who does not experience sexual attraction (= the feeling of liking someone sexually): Some studies suggest that there are as many asexuals as there are gay people in society. Synonym
ace (SEXUALITY) informalCompare
aromantic noun
